title: Portfolio
detail: If you are reading this, I acomplished my goal with this proyect. My portfolio is where I intend to showcase everything I've been learning the last years about Web and mostly Frontend desing.

title: Winery
detail: I created this proyect when I got started in React and NodeJS, (still under development), it's a fully functional winery web, it includes landig page, subpages, and an administration section.

title: Ad Astra
detail: Ad Astra it's a Discord Bot I made in order to record information about songs when them are played in a server with the most popular music bots. Its fully writed in JavaScript.
